summary: SHIMA SHIMA Store Information - 100% of our products are designed and made with LOVE in Mexico. Most of our products are handmade with care, attention, and patience. Inspired by simple living, the salty air, and vibrant sun of Mexico, we wish to share with you lovely products which are a combination of our original designs, skillful artisans and Designers. We hope you enjoy your visit to our mini boutique in Historical Art District of San Jose del Cabo. BIG HUGS to you from all of us at SHIMA SHIMA!
